[Adblock Plus 2.8]

! Title: 🛡 RuBlockList for uBO

! Expires: 6 days (update frequency)

! Homepage: https://github.com/h8nor/docs/tree/master/vendor/firefox/
! Please report any unblocked tracking or problems.
! https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/wiki/Static-filter-syntax#cosmetic-filters
!
!--------------------General tracking systems-----------------------------------!
/advertising.$~object-subrequest
/adriver.$~object-subrequest
/googleads.$~object-subrequest
/pagead2.$~object-subrequest
||bs.yandex.
||kiks.yandex.
||yabs.yandex.
||yastatic.*/daas/
||youtube.com/api/stats/
||avito.ru/s/a/*/px.js
||admitad.com^$third-party
||advertur.ru^$third-party
||autoi.ru^$third-party
||google*manager.com^$third-party
||google*services.com^$third-party
||lentainform.com^$third-party
||metrika.mos.ru^$3p
||recreativ.ru^$third-party
||relap.io^$third-party

||smi2.$third-party
||top100.ru^$third-party
||yastatic.net/browser*$third-party
||yastatic.net/sovetnik$third-party

!--------------------Hidden third-party tracking domains------------------------!
$removeparam=/^(gclid|yclid|fbclid)=/
$removeparam=/^(utm_source|utm_medium|utm_term)=/
$removeparam=/^(utm_content|utm_campaign|utm_referrer)=/
||adfront.org^$third-party
||adrelayer.com^$third-party
||cdn7.rocks^$third-party
||cshi.ru^$third-party

||yandexadexchange.net^$third-party
||*yandex.*^$removeparam=/^(clid|mlid|msid)=/

!--------------------Social networking links------------------------------------!
aliexpress.com## div.ui-fixed-panel-shares
artlebedev.ru## div#social_buttons, div[style^="position:relative;top:2px;"], div[style^="margin: 0px 22px"]
autoburn.ru## strong.text-muted, strong.text-muted ~ span
cyberforum.ru## div.yashare-auto-init
disk.yandex.ru## div.nb-share
drive2.ru## span.c-share
fb.ru## div#share_img, div.share_block, div.fsb_box
greasyfork.org## div#share

m.habrahabr.ru## div.bottom_buttons_panel
interfax.ru## div.socialFull
lenta.ru## div.b-socials__container
life.ru## div.social-share__counter, div.social-share__icons
livejournal.com## div.lj-like, li.share
ntv.ru## li[class$="li"], div.likeasking
proza.ru## span.b-share
ren.tv## div.social-likes
ria.ru## div.b-social-userbar__expand-button, div.b-social-userbar__soc-container, div.b-social-userbar__expand-block

tass.ru## div.b-share, div.b-social-buttons
vedomosti.ru## ul#social-counters
vm.ru## div.share-block
youtube.com## div#share-services-container
!--------------------Advertising blocks and scripts-----------------------------!
## iframe:not([src*="/www.youtube.com/"]):not([src*="/player.vimeo.com/"]):not([src*="/www.google.com/recaptcha/"]):not(src*="/www.slideshare.net/"])
## div[id*="ads"], div[id*="adv"], div[id*="banner"]
## div[class*="adv"]:not([class*="advanced-search"]):not(role="banner")
## div[class*="banner"], div[class*="promo"]
## span[class*="promo"]
## div[id$="underline"], div[class^="adblock"], div[class^="adsbygoogle"]
cyberforum.ru## div.page > div > div[id] > div
drive2.ru## div#side-dv-pinned, div.js-recommendations.c-block
drive2.ru## div.c-block > div[class^="c-dv"], div.c-block > div[class^="c-dv"] + div, div.c-block > div.c-block__fake-gap
!! Главная dzen.ru
dzen.ru## div.content div[id]:has( > div:contains(/Реклама|(Быстрый и безопасный|Установите удобный и быстрый) Яндекс Браузер/) )
dzen.ru## div.content div[class^="promo-floors-entries"]
!+dzen.ru##div[aria-label="Лента Дзена"]
!+ 1 линия -- Рекламный блок вместо card
dzen.ru## div[aria-label="Лента Дзена"] div[id^="zen-row"] article:not( :is( [data-testid^="floor-"][data-testid$="-card"], [id="card-wrapper-short-carousel"] ) )
!! Статьи Дзен
!+ 1 линия -- Видеореклама -- dzen.ru/articles
!+dzen.ru,frontend.vh.yandex.ru,widgets.kinopoisk.ru,www.kinopoisk.ru,yastatic.net##+js(no-xhr-if, strm.yandex.ru/get/)
!+ 2 линия -- Подгружаемая реклама -- dzen.ru/articles
dzen.ru## main div[id^="zen-row"][data-testid="feed-row"]:has( article + div:not( :is( [data-testid="card-brief"], [data-testid="Карточка статьи"] ) ) )
!+ 1 линия -- Подгружаемая реклама -- dzen.ru/a
dzen.ru##+js(set-constant, Object.prototype.getUaasConfig, undefined)
dzen.ru,frontend.vh.yandex.ru,www.kinopoisk.ru,widgets.kinopoisk.ru,yastatic.net##+js(set-constant, Object.prototype.partnerId, {})
fb.ru## div.text-ad-block
greasyfork.org## div#script-show-info-ad
! 2021-09-28 + https://habr.com
! Убрать все блоки кроме вопросов
habr.com##div.tm-article-feed-blocks:not(:has(div.tm-project-block_variant-questions))
interfax.ru## div[id^="pl"][id*="ban"]
life.ru## div#vn-player
livejournal.com## div.lj-recommended, div.b-discoverytimes-wrapper
overclockers.ru## table.decoblock > tbody, div.decoblock-content, div#uhi, div#topbanners > div > a
forums.overclockers.ru## table.needblock
! 2021-10 https://my.mosenergosbyt.ru
my.mosenergosbyt.ru##div[testid="formContainer"]
pornhub.com,redtube.com## div[style^="display:"][style*="block"], div.footerWrapper
redtube.com## div.videosTable > h2 ~ h2, div.videosTable > ul.pornStarsThumbs
redtube.com## div.video-page-right-col > .tja, div.videosTable > .tja
redtube.com## div#slidePanelContainerAB
ren.tv## div[id^="block-block"] > div.content > div:not(#comments)
rgho.st## div.alert.alert-warning:not([role])
ria.ru## div.antiblock
rutracker.org## table#topic_main > tbody:not([id]):not(:first-of-type)
sourceforge.net## div.top3-widget, div#newsletter-floating, div#taboola-below-article-thumbnails
! Auto.ru
auto.ru## div[style^="display: block !important"]
auto.ru## table.listing > tbody[class*="-tgb"], table.listing > tbody[class*="-special-table"], div.listing > div:not([data-bem])
! 2021-09 Github
gist.github.com##.gist-banner

google.com,google.ru## #extrares, .pdp-psy, #pdp-psy

youtube.com## div#movie_player > div.ytp-cards-teaser

youtube.com##.ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox
youtube.com##.opened
! Mail.ru News
news.mail.ru## div.box_collapse
! 2021-09 Yandex Реклама в поиске
yandex.*##h2 > a[data-event-required]:upward(li.serp-item)
! 2021-09 Yandex Popup
yandex.*##.zalogin-smart
yandex.*##.desk-notif-card__teaser-container
yandex.*##.dist-popup__content.popup__content
yandex.*##.distr-popup__content.popup2__content

## div#ya-share, div.ya-share2, div > yatag
yandex.ru## i.b-counter + div[class~="dist-popup"], i.b-counter + iframe + div[class~="dist-popup"]
yandex.ru## div.content__left > div[class~="head-stripe"]
yandex.ru## div.content__left > ul[class~="serp-list"] > div:first-child:not([class~="z-sport"]), div[class~="footer-stripe"]
yandex.ru## div.related, div.scroll-spy, div[id*="teaser"]
yandex.ru## .serp-item > div.organic > h2.organic__title-wrapper_multiline_yes, .serp-item > div.organic > h2.organic__title-wrapper_multiline_yes ~ div
yandex.ru## li[class^="serp-item "]:not([class$="adresa"]):not([class*="forum"]):not([class~="z-images"]):not([class~="z-maps"]):not([class~="z-market"]):not([class~="z-taxi"]):not([class*="mime-view"])
rasp.yandex.ru## ul.SearchSegments > div:not([class^="Search"]):not(.FilterGone)
! Yandex Images
yandex.ru## div.page-layout__column_type_content.page-layout__column > div[class~="dist"]
yandex.ru## div.incut__wrapper_footer_yes.incut__wrapper
! Yandex Maps
yandex.ru## div.home-panel-content-view__body > div:not([class])
yandex.ru## div.route-panel-content-view > div:last-child
yandex.ru## div.search-snippet-view:nth-of-type(-n+2) > a[target="_blank"], div.search-snippet-view:nth-of-type(-n+2) > div[style^="display:"][style*="block"]
yandex.ru## div.traffic-home-panel-view > div[style*="display: block"]
! Yandex News
news.yandex.ru## h3.title[id^="title"], div.page-content__left > span, div.page-content__right > span
news.yandex.ru## div.page-content__left > div[-abp-properties="display: block !important;"]
news.yandex.ru## div.page-content__right > div[-abp-properties="display: block !important;"]
! Yandex Market
market.yandex.ru## div.n-roll, div#statji-i-podborki
! Yandex Video
yandex.ru## div[id^="dist"]
! Habrahabr

geektimes.ru## .post__body_full.post__body > .html_format.content > a[href="https://dronk.ru/"]:last-of-type > img
m.habrahabr.ru## div.similar_posts, div.popular_posts, div.geektimes_posts, div.footer__section:first-of-type

2gis.ru## div.noResults__googletag
drive2.ru## div.g-column-wide > div:not(.offer) > div.c-block:not([class*="c-block-"])
!+ Блоки рекламы справа -- dzen.ru/a
dzen.ru## main [id="article__right"] div[class$="__main"]:has( div[class$="__sticky"] )

kinozal.me,kinozal.tv## div.menu > div.bx2_0:nth-last-child(2)

rus24.tv## div.slider

!--------------------Restoring (unblock) iframes--------------------------------!
~2gis.ru## iframe#intercom-frame, iframe.chat__containerIframe
~codepen.io## iframe[src*="/s.codepen.io/boomerang/"]
~life.ru## iframe.comments-iframe, iframe[src*="/embed.life.ru/video/"]
! https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/542220/
~avito.ru,~drom.ru## iframe[src*="/autoburn.ru/"]
~exist.ru## iframe#tip_f
! Google
~google.com,~google.ru## iframe[id][class$="b"]
~mail.google.com,~youtube.com## iframe[src*="/webchat/"], iframe[src*="/notifications/"], iframe[class="talk-iframe"]
~translate.google.com,~translate.google.ru## iframe[src*="/translate.googleusercontent.com/"]
! Mail.ru
~deti.mail.ru,~lady.mail.ru## iframe[id^="instagram"]
! Yandex
~yandex.ru## iframe[src*="/mail.yandex.ru/"]
! Yandex Video
~yandex.ru## iframe[aria-label="Video"]
!--------------------Whitelists to fix broken sites-----------------------------!
! 2021-09
@@||cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/*$script,stylesheet,font,domain=mermaid-js.github.io

~2gis.ru## div.mediaPhotoSlider__photos > div._advertiser, div.mediaCard__wrapper > div._type_advertiser
! Auto.ru (all parameters), Yandex Images
~auto.ru,~yandex.ru## div[class*="adv"]
! Mail.ru
~mail.ru## div.js-slider__content
~deti.mail.ru,~lady.mail.ru## div[class*="promo"], div[class*="promo"][data-module]
@@||issues.adblockplus.org^$document
! Yandex Maps (div.home-panel-content-view__tip)
@@||yabs.yandex.*/count/$domain=yandex.ru
@@||yabs.yandex.*/resource/$domain=yandex.ru
